text:
We have updated our website with more analyst research from
@Tennyson_Secs
(
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F).

Previously only the latest research note (not shorter research updates) was visible but now we are able to share all the updates Tennyson make.

The research on the website goes back to the end of June 2025 and we will update the website when Tennyson publish new notes or shorter research updates.
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Smarter Convert - $21 Million Subscription.

The Smarter Web Company is pleased to announce the launch of Smarter Convert, a strategic, interest free capital-raising initiative structured as a convertible bond, denominated in Bitcoin. This innovative instrument has been fully subscribed by TOBAM for $21 million, a respected institutional investor and independent, employee-owned asset management firm founded in 2006 by Yves Choueifaty.
@asjwebley
said "We have been building our Bitcoin-backed balance sheet with laser focus, and today’s announcement marks yet another first for the UK capital markets. I am grateful to Yves and his team for their collaboration and support in bringing this innovative structure to life. We believe that this new structure will open up a new segment of capital for the Company and complement our existing funding strategies as we pursue our ambition to make The Smarter Web Company into one of the largest publicly listed companies in the UK."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Placing and Subscription - £8.1m Proceeds.

The Smarter Web Company is pleased to announce a Placing with a well-known institutional investor and a Subscription with a high-net-worth individual investor at the closing bid price on 01 August 2025.

The Placing has raised £5,250,000 (before expenses) and the Subscription has raised £2,867,860 (before expenses), through the issue of 3,959,906 new ordinary shares of £0.001 each ("Ordinary Shares") at £2.05 per share.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Change Of Auditor.

The Smarter Web Company, a London listed technology company, announces that following a competitive tender process, the Board has appointed PKF Littlejohn LLP as the Company’s independent auditor.  Accordingly, Adler Shine has resigned from its role as auditor with immediate effect and has not raised any matters that need to be drawn to the attention of the Company’s member or creditors.
@asjwebley
, CEO of The Smarter Web Company said: "I would like to express my thanks to Adler Shine for their support to date; they have been a pleasure to work with. As we enter an exciting new phase in the Company’s journey, we have selected PKF Littlejohn as our new auditors and look forward to working with them."

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Subscription Tranche Update - £3.7m Proceeds.

The Smarter Web Company, a London listed technology company, announces that 1,898,201 new Ordinary Shares have been placed from the current tranche.

The proceeds of the 1,898,201 new Ordinary Shares are £3,662,512 (before expenses), equivalent to approximately £1.93 per share, and the Company will receive approximately 97% of the proceeds as settlement early this week. The shares were placed in line with the Subscription Agreement, over a 2-week period, between 11 August and 22 August.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Head Of Bitcoin Strategy Appointment.

The Smarter Web Company, a London listed technology company, is pleased to announce the appointment of
@Croesus_BTC
in a full-time role as Head of Bitcoin Strategy.

Jesse was appointed, announced 18 June 2025, in a part-time capacity as Bitcoin Strategy Consultant.

Since then, Jesse has become a key part of the team, adding value in a variety of ways to The Smarter Web Company and its Bitcoin treasury strategy. The Smarter Web Company is pleased to welcome Jesse in a full-time capacity to continue in his role as a vital part of our Bitcoin treasury strategy, with an exclusive focus on The Smarter Web Company going forward.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company (
#SWC
$TSWCF
$3M8.F) RNS Announcement: Subscription Tranche Update - £7.6m Proceeds.

The Smarter Web Company, a London listed technology company, announces that 3,452,086 new Ordinary Shares have been placed from the current tranche.

The proceeds of the 3,452,086 new Ordinary Shares are £7,626,129 (before expenses), equivalent to approximately £2.21 per share, and the Company will receive approximately 97% of the proceeds as settlement early this week. The shares were placed in line with the Subscription Agreement, over a 2-week period, between 28 July and 08 August with no shares being placed on some days.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…
